item.title: Choppy scrolling on iOS with iscroll and PhoneGap
item.description: I ran into a situation this weekend where certain pages of a PhoneGap application were incredibly choppy on iOS versions pre 4.3.x. Apparently, there is a problem with older browsers using CSS3 selectors like div[style*='foo’]in combination with other DOM elements. The test case was a little tricky to create, seeing that pinpointing this problem required mucho testing. However, I minimized the markup and CSS to only a few classes and DOM elements.
